title: Steven Jacobs leads the celebrity arrivals at the opening night of Billy Elliot the musical
text:
Steven Jacobs looked thrilled to be attending the opening night of Billy Elliot the musical alongside his young daughter, Isabella.

The 52-year-old Today weatherman opted to take his eight-year-old daughter to the show's premiere in Sydney on Friday.

Holding his daughter in his arms, Steve smiled happily as they posed for photos together ahead of the musical.

Daddy's girl! Today weatherman Steven Jacobs (pictured) lead the celebrity arrivals at the opening night of Billy Elliot the musical accompanied by his adorable daughter Isabella

He looked suave in a pair of skinny leg black jeans, which he paired with a black, white and grey floral print shirt.

Steve rounded out his ensemble with a black blazer and black lace-up shoes.

Also in attendance for the show's premiere was Kerri-Anne Kennerley, who stepped out in a colourful ensemble.

All smiles: Holding his daughter in his arms, Steve (pictured with Isabella) smiled happily as they posed for photos together ahead of the musical

The 66-year-old Studio 10 host opted for a retro-inspired ensemble, wearing orange, pink, grey, black and white patterned pants.

She paired them with a pink sequinned long sleeve top, and wore sparkly red cowboy boots.

Former Home and Away star Olivia Deeble also stepped out for the show's opening night, dressed in a turquoise coloured sheath dress.

Sparkle: Kerri-Anne Kennerley (pictured) also made an appearance, opting for a retro-inspired ensemble, wearing orange, pink, grey, black and white patterned pants

Fashionista! Kerri-Anne paired her outfit with a pink sequinned long sleeve top, and wore sparkly red cowboy boots

The 17-year-old upcoming Disney star's dress featured a one-shoulder neckline, and dramatic cape sleeve on one arm.

She wore colourful satin stilettos, and her long blonde hair slicked back in an updo.

David Campbell was also on hand for the show's opening night, accompanied by his wife of 11 years, Lisa.

Striking! Former Home and Away star Olivia Deeble (pictured) also dressed to impress in a turquoise coloured sheath dress

Glamour: Olivia (pictured) wore colourful satin stilettos, and wore her long blonde hair slicked back in an updo

The 46-year-old Today Extra host looked handsome in black pants and a black button-up shirt, which he paired with a grey-silver tuxedo jacket.

Meanwhile, Lisa opted for a purple shift dress, which she wore with nude block heels.

The Block's Scott Cam also turned out for the opening night, dressed casually in blue jeans and a grey button-up shirt.

Loved-up: David Campbell (pictured) was also on hand for the show's opening night, accompanied by his wife of 11 years, Lisa (right)

Smile! David looked handsome in black pants and a black button-up shirt while Lisa opted for a purple shift dress

Style: The Block's Scott Cam (pictured), dressed casually in blue jeans and a grey button-up shirt

The 56-year-old also donned a navy blue blazer with a patterned kerchief in the breast pocket, and wore dark Chelsea boots.

In keeping with the show's colour theme, Ita Buttrose turned out in a red sequined twinset.

The 77-year-old ABC chairperson also donned midnight blue pants with smalls slits at the front near the ankles.

Making a statement! Ita Buttrose (pictured) turned out in a red sequined twinset and midnight blue pants with smalls slits at the front near the ankles

Shine bright: Ita (pictured) wore a full face of make-up consisting of dewy foundation, rosy cheeks and a striking red lip

Hot off his appearance on The Masked Singer, Darren McMullen made a statement at the opening night.

The 37-year-old TV presenter went for black pants, a black shirt and grey blazer with a kerchief in the jacket pocket.

He also donned black thick-rimmed glasses, and wore black loafers as he posed confidently ahead of the show.

Fashion: Darren McMullen (pictured) was also in attendance and went for black pants, a black shirt and grey blazer

Rounding out the celebrity arrivals was Amber Sherlock, who looked chic in a patterned skater dress with structured shoulders.

The 43-year-old finished off her look with a pair of strappy metallic stilettos and dangly earrings.

She wore her shoulder-length brown hair in loose waves, and wore lashings of mascara.
description: Steven Jacobs looked thrilled to be attending the opening night of Billy Elliot the musical alongside his young daughter, Isabella.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
